entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore was mentioned as being ill and weak. He was also the one who immobilized Harry under the Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape was mentioned as the one who killed Dumbledore with the Avada Kedavra curse.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry witnessed the death of Dumbledore and was under the Invisibility Cloak when it happened.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy was mentioned as one of the Death Eaters who arrived at the Astronomy Tower.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny was present and tried to comfort Madam Pomfrey when she burst into tears.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey burst into tears upon hearing about Dumbledore's death.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron was present and reacted with a groan when Harry described the events leading to Dumbledore's death.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna's mouth trembled upon hearing about Dumbledore's death.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione clapped her hands to her mouth in reaction to Harry's description of the events leading to Dumbledore's death.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks whispered a question about how Dumbledore died.

entities.name: avada kedavra
entities.description: The Avada Kedavra curse was mentioned as the one used by Snape to kill Dumbledore.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: Harry was under the Invisibility Cloak when he was immobilized by Dumbledore.

entities.name: astronomy tower
entities.description: The Astronomy Tower was mentioned as the location where Dumbledore died.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters were mentioned as arriving at the Astronomy Tower.

relationships.description: Snape killed Dumbledore with the Avada Kedavra curse.
Malfoy was one of the Death Eaters who arrived at the Astronomy Tower.
Dumbledore immobilized Harry under the Invisibility Cloak.
Snape used the Avada Kedavra curse to kill Dumbledore.
Death Eaters arrived at the Astronomy Tower.
Harry was under the Invisibility Cloak when he was immobilized by Dumbledore.
